mapper.insert: insert into warehouse (ID, NAME, REMARK, IDDELETED, WarehouseNo) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iddeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warehouseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(id) from warehouse where iddeleted = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into warehouse
ID,
NAME,
REMARK,
IDDELETED,
WarehouseNo,

NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDDELETED = #{idDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
